data.eml:eml: Pseudopoda fissa sp. nov. — first record of the genus from Vietnam (Araneae: Sparassidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jäger, Peter, Vedel, Vincent (2005): Pseudopoda fissa sp. nov. — first record of the genus from Vietnam (Araneae: Sparassidae). Zootaxa 837: 1-5, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170691
